title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Atalaya Mountain Trail – Santa Fe, New Mexico
content:
Photo submitted by Eric Manske, “Autumnal New Mexico sunset from Atalaya Mountain.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day. Send in your pics with a description here.

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Atalaya Mountain Trail – Santa Fe, New Mexico appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
